SELECT l.list_user_seq, u.user_nickname, l.list_title, l.list_content, l.list_created_time, l.list_updated_time, COUNT(k.like_seq) AS like_count, r.restaurant_title, m.list_matzip_comment, r.restaurant_address, r.restaurant_phone, r.restaurant_star
FROM lists l LEFT JOIN list_matzip m ON l.list_seq = m.list_seq LEFT JOIN restaurant r ON m.restaurant_seq = r.restaurant_seq LEFT JOIN `like` k ON m.list_seq = k.list_seq LEFT JOIN users u ON l.list_user_seq = u.user_seq WHERE l.list_seq = #{listSeq} GROUP BY l.list_seq, r.restaurant_seq, m.list_matzip_seq ORDER BY l.list_title ASC;
